title: Skills
body:
Skills lots are the place to be for gaining skills at the fastest rate. Skilling is a very passive activity, so it's a good thing to do if you want to have a casual conversation or split your attention with something else. Keep an eye on the skills the people on the property are raising - skill speed is greatly influenced by the number of people increasing the same as you. Motives are pretty hard here, so if you want to skill for the longest time, you should consider [s][color=white]Overfilling[/color][/s] your motives at Services or Entertainment lots.

Motives: [s][color=#FF9999]Hard[/color][/s], Speciality: [s]Faster skill gain.[/s]
